name: Niks227.GitHub.io
body:
## _Social Music_

Revolutionize the way people share and discover latest music. 
An app which seamlessly integrates the influence of the social aspect of your life with your music thereby keeping you more connected with your social group. 
Used AWS Elastic Beanstalk  for hosting, Crashlytics for crash reporting, beta distribution and mobile analytics.
Used APIs of Sound Cloud, iTunes and  grace note for Songs, Album art and music identification.
Used OOPS concept for code designing and maintenance.      
[Github Link](http://niks227.github.io/music_app)

## _Webkiosk (Student Information Application)_

With Webkiosk you can-
* Quickly access your time table
* View attendance.
* View detailed attendance of every subject for a better picture.
* Reschedule, add or delete a specific time slot in the timetable according to your need.      
[Play Store Link](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blackMonster.webkioskApp)

## _Jiit Book Club_

A web-based project that allows user to buy/sell old books. 
Application of PHP, AJAX, jQuery, JavaScript, SQL.     
[Facebook Page](https://www.facebook.com/JiitBookClub)

## _SMS Based Information Retrieval System_

Retrieving class schedules and tutorials.
Used Cron jobs and  Natural language processing (NLP) to decode and reply to mails.     
[Github Link](http://niks227.github.io/SMS-Based-Information-Retrieval-System/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
